short_definition: A document notifying defendant that an action has been instituted against him and that he is required to answer to it at a time and place named.
long_definition_html: A document notifying defendant that an action has been instituted against him and that he is required to answer to it at a time and place named.
long_definition_markdown: A document notifying defendant that an action has been instituted against him and that he is required to answer to it at a time and place named.
long_definition_text: A document notifying defendant that an action has been instituted against him and that he is required to answer to it at a time and place named.
